meanings.definition: The state of being free from blame or guilt.
meanings.sent1: Her blamelessness in the situation was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: His blamelessness in the matter was unquestionable.
meanings.sent3: Despite the messy room, her blamelessness shone through.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of accusations, her blamelessness was a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The purity of her blamelessness was like a clear sky after a storm.

meanings.definition: The quality of not deserving blame.
meanings.sent1: The blamelessness of his actions was recognized by all.
meanings.sent2: She carried herself with an air of blamelessness.
meanings.sent3: Even the mischievous puppy couldn't tarnish her blamelessness.
meanings.sent4: His blamelessness was a shield against false accusations.
meanings.sent5: The aura of her blamelessness was as refreshing as a cool breeze on a hot day.
